verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] approved federal disaster aid for residents whose homes were destroyed or damaged because of the Kilauea volcano eruption in Hawaii .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: approved] [ARG1: federal disaster aid for residents whose homes were destroyed or damaged because of the Kilauea volcano eruption in Hawaii] .
President Donald Trump has approved federal disaster aid for residents whose homes [V: were] destroyed or damaged because of the Kilauea volcano eruption in Hawaii .
President Donald Trump has approved federal disaster aid for [R-ARG1: residents] [ARG1: whose homes] were [V: destroyed] or damaged [ARGM-CAU: because of the Kilauea volcano eruption in Hawaii] .
President Donald Trump has approved federal disaster aid for [R-ARG1: residents] [ARG1: whose homes] were destroyed or [V: damaged] [ARGM-CAU: because of the Kilauea volcano eruption in Hawaii] .
